content.title: Fodder Minikits under Integrated Fodder Development Scheme (General Category)
content.department: Directorate of Animal Husbandry, Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Co-operation Department, Government of Gujarat
content.details: The scheme 'Fodder Minikits under Integrated Fodder Development Scheme' is implemented by the Directorate of Animal Husbandry, Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Co-operation Department, Government of Gujarat. Under this scheme, improved varieties of fodder seeds are provided to beneficiaries for widespread publicity, demonstration, and adaptation by farmers.
benefits: Under this scheme, the fodder seed minikit of 3 Kg, 7 Kg, or 10 Kg is given to the eligible beneficiary.
eligibility: The beneficiary should be a permanent resident of Gujarat.
Any beneficiary of the General category can avail the benefits under the scheme.
The beneficiary should possess 10 Guntha of land to his or her name.
content.application_process: To avail the benefits of the scheme, the beneficiary may contact a nearby Veterinary dispensary or First Aid Veterinary Centre.
documents_required: Proof of possessing 10 Guntha of land

faqs.question: Who implements this scheme in Gujarat?
faqs.answer: The scheme is implemented by the Directorate of Animal Husbandry, Agriculture, Farmers Welfare, and Co-operation Department, Government of Gujarat.

faqs.question: What are the available benefits under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Eligible beneficiaries receive fodder seed minikits of 3 Kg, 7 Kg, or 10 Kg.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to benefit from this scheme?
faqs.answer: To be eligible, the beneficiary must be a permanent resident of Gujarat and belong to the General category.

faqs.question: Are there any land ownership requirements for eligibility?
faqs.answer: Yes, the beneficiary should possess at least 10 Guntha of land in their name.

faqs.question: How can one apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: To avail the benefits, the beneficiary may contact a nearby Veterinary dispensary or First Aid Veterinary Centre.
